title: Patricia Breen Pierre-Auguste Renoir Chrysanthemums Egg Ornament
description:
Ornament developed from Pierre-Auguste Renoir’s Chrysanthemums, 1881-82, from the Art Institute of Chicago’s collection.

This limited edition Patricia Breen ornament is mouth blown and hand silvered glass, generously accented with Austrian crystals.  Crafted from the skillful hand of Patricia Breen in her Krakow studio, this design was produced in a limited quantity and made exclusively for the Art Institute of Chicago.

  • Dimensions: 3.54 x 2.16 diameter.
  • Materials: Glass, Austrian crystals.
  • Hand painted, silvered.
  • Made in Poland.

*Please note: Discounts and promotional pricing do not apply.
